summary:
Custom-made cartoon Buster sword
In obvious resemblence to Cloud's buster sword. (Final Fantasy)
Because it's his.
Just cartoony.

:D

Located in stabbed into a stone in Whiterun.
Take an immediate right turn upon entering Whiterun.
Follow the perimeter, and it will be on your lef
descriptionHtml:
Custom-made cartoon Buster sword
In obvious resemblence to Cloud's buster sword. (Final Fantasy)
Because it's his.
Just cartoony.

:D

The Buster's item number is "3f00182e"
Located in stabbed into a stone in Whiterun.
Take an immediate right turn upon entering Whiterun.
Follow the perimeter, and it will be on your left.

---
If you own the photo, congrats and thank you. If this mod bothers you, I will take it down.
---

Still in prototype-mode (I made this in four hours one morning).
I will do major polishing if you guys like this mod.

******************************************************************************************************************************

if you have requests for mods, please ask.
But NOTE: I am human, and I am also a college student. If I can not, or do not take your request(s) please refrain from attacks.
-However, it will be unlikely that I refuse a request.


Guidelines for Requests:
Must be a weapon (for now)
Must be unique of other Nexus/Steam mods
Must NOT be exceeding in two requests at one time
In no way will pushiness, or ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥-ness be tolerated
Commencing of rude behavior will result in immediate purge of all mod data

Otherwise, go ahead and ask!
As always, thank you for existing. (:

(Also on Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=229880723)
author: Kolton Burke
